name: Homegrown Pet
description:
CONTENT WARNING : Body Horror, Partial Nudity.

Your pet has unfortunately turned back into shape of tiny cute blob.
You need to feed him fast in span of 60 second before the authorities arrived!

Depending on what you feed him, he might turn into a big handsome human thus making him easier to hide, or unspeakable horror  cuteness that capable of ending the world.

Easy control! And with 21 different endings to get!
How will you raise your pet in span of 60 second?

Reason for suubmission to Virtual Pet Jam : Interactive simulation contains you being the guardian of some manner being (in this case. A cute blob of flesh)
Reason for submission to AGDQ : This game is made in span less than a week
